statements.select: SELECT Codigo, Codigo + ' - ' + Descripcion AS Descripcion FROM Cupones WHERE Active = #Active# ORDER by Codigo

SELECT BeginDate, Order_Count, Location_Code, Net_Sales INTO ##TotalOrders FROM KeysExtractsCorpVersion WHERE EndDate BETWEEN #DateIni# AND #DateEnd# AND Location_Code = #NumTienda#
SELECT OE.Ord_Dt, OC.CouponCode, Cup.Descripcion, COUNT(OC.CouponCode) AS CountOrdenCupon, TOr.Order_Count, TOr.Net_Sales, CAST(((CAST(COUNT(OC.CouponCode) AS DECIMAL(12,2)) * CAST(100 AS DECIMAL(12,2))) / CAST(TOr.Order_Count AS DECIMAL(12,2))) AS DECIMAL(12,2)) AS PorcOrderCupon, SUM(OE.Menu_Amt) AS Menu_Amt, SUM(OE.Disc_Amt) AS Disc_Amt, SUM(OE.Net_Amt) AS Net_Amt, SUM(OE.Tax_Amt) AS Tax_Amt, SUM(OE.Cust_Amt) AS Cust_Amt FROM OrderCoupons OC INNER JOIN ##TotalOrders TOr ON OC.Location_Code = TOr.Location_Code AND OC.Order_Date = TOr.BeginDate INNER JOIN OrdersExtracts OE ON OC.Order_Date = OE.Ord_Dt AND OC.Order_Number = OE.Ord_No AND OC.Location_Code = OE.Store_No INNER JOIN Cupones Cup ON OC.CouponCode = Cup.Codigo WHERE OC.Order_Date BETWEEN #DateIni# AND #DateEnd# AND OC.Location_Code = #NumTienda#
CouponCode IN
#LstCuponCode[]#
GROUP BY OE.Ord_Dt, OC.CouponCode, Cup.Descripcion, TOr.Order_Count, TOr.Net_Sales ORDER BY OE.Ord_Dt, OC.CouponCode
DROP TABLE ##TotalOrders
statements.insert: INSERT INTO Cupones (Codigo, Descripcion, Validity, Active) VALUES (#Codigo#, #Descripcion#, #Validity#, #Active#)
statements.update: UPDATE Cupones SET Descripcion = #Descripcion#, Validity = #Validity# WHERE Codigo = #Codigo#
UPDATE Cupones SET Active = 0 WHERE Codigo = #Codigo# OR Descripcion = 'baja'
statements.select:
SELECT O.Location_Code AS Tienda, OrdersDump.Added_By as Num_Empleado, E.First_Name+' '+E.Last_Name AS Empleado, SUM(CASE WHEN O.CouponCode = '2A80' THEN O.OrdCpnQty ELSE 0 END ) AS Cupon1Quantity, SUM(CASE WHEN O.CouponCode = 'CHY189' THEN O.OrdCpnQty ELSE 0 END ) AS Cupon2Quantity, SUM(CASE WHEN O.CouponCode = 'N2E59' THEN O.OrdCpnQty ELSE 0 END ) AS Cupon3Quantity, SUM(CASE WHEN O.CouponCode = 'PQCD2' THEN O.OrdCpnQty ELSE 0 END ) AS Cupon4Quantity, SUM(CASE WHEN O.CouponCode = 'USG49' THEN O.OrdCpnQty ELSE 0 END) AS Cupon5Quantity, SUM(CASE WHEN O.CouponCode = 'AD89' THEN O.OrdCpnQty ELSE 0 END) AS Cupon6Quantity, SUM(CASE WHEN O.CouponCode = 'AD892' THEN O.OrdCpnQty ELSE 0 END) AS Cupon7Quantity, sum(O.OrdCpnQty) as Cantidad INTO ##CxEmpleado FROM OrderCoupons O left join EmployeePOS E on E.location_code=O.location_code inner join OrdersDump on E.Employee_Code=OrdersDump.Added_By and ordersdump.location_code = O.location_code and ordersdump.Order_Number=O.Order_Number LEFT JOIN Tiendas T ON O.Location_Code = T.Number_tienda WHERE (O.Order_Date BETWEEN #DateIni# AND #DateEnd#) AND CouponCode IN ('CHY189','USG49','2A80','N2E59','PQCD2','AD89','AD892') AND Order_Status_Code='4' AND OrdersDump.Added_By not in ('1535','1441','2244','7057','6623','5395','9465','6636','4270','8244','1188','9593','2605','8504','0403','7960','9076','1566','3515','8852','5298','9860','6723','3006','0401','1106','2345','7571','3417','6833','3829','4807','7664','9022')
O.Location_Code = #NumTienda#
T.Ubicacion = #UbicacionTienda#
GROUP BY O.Location_Code, OrdersDump.Added_By, E.First_Name, E.Last_Name
SELECT OrdersDump.Location_Code as Tienda, OrdersDump.Added_By as Num_Empleado, EmployeePOS.First_Name+' '+EmployeePOS.Last_Name as Empleado, COUNT(OrdersDump.Order_Number) as Cantidad_Ordenes INTO ##OrdenesXEmpleado FROM OrdersDump LEFT JOIN EmployeePOS on employeepos.location_code=OrdersDump.location_code and employeepos.Employee_Code=ordersdump.added_by LEFT JOIN Tiendas T ON OrdersDump.Location_Code = T.Number_tienda WHERE (OrdersDump.Order_Date BETWEEN #DateIni# AND #DateEnd#) AND OrdersDump.Order_Status_Code='4'
OrdersDump.Location_Code = #NumTienda#
T.Ubicacion = #UbicacionTienda#
GROUP BY OrdersDump.Location_Code, OrdersDump.Added_By, EmployeePOS.First_Name, EmployeePOS.Last_Name
SELECT OXE.Tienda AS Location_Code, CXE.Num_Empleado ,CXE.Empleado AS NombreEmpleado ,OXE.Cantidad_Ordenes as Cupon8Quantity ,CXE.Cupon1Quantity ,CXE.Cupon2Quantity ,CXE.Cupon3Quantity ,CXE.Cupon4Quantity ,CXE.Cupon5Quantity ,CXE.Cupon6Quantity ,CXE.Cupon7Quantity ,CONVERT(float,(CXE.Cupon1Quantity * 1.5)) as cupon9Quantity ,convert(float,(CXE.Cupon2Quantity * 2)) as cupon11Quantity ,convert(float,(CXE.Cupon3Quantity * 1)) as cupon12Quantity ,convert(float,(CXE.Cupon4Quantity * 0)) as cupon13Quantity ,convert(float,(CXE.Cupon5Quantity * 0)) as cupon14Quantity ,convert(float,(CXE.Cupon6Quantity * 1.5)) as cupon15Quantity ,convert(float,(CXE.Cupon7Quantity * 1.5)) as cupon16Quantity ,case when convert(float, CXE.Cantidad*100) /OXE.Cantidad_Ordenes>40 and ((CXE.Cupon1Quantity * 1.5) + (CXE.Cupon2Quantity * 2) + (CXE.Cupon3Quantity * 1) + (CXE.Cupon4Quantity * 0) + (CXE.Cupon5Quantity * 0) + (CXE.Cupon6Quantity * 1.5) + (CXE.Cupon7Quantity * 1.5))>65 then ((CXE.Cupon1Quantity * 1.5) + (CXE.Cupon2Quantity * 2) + (CXE.Cupon3Quantity * 1) + (CXE.Cupon4Quantity * 0) + (CXE.Cupon5Quantity * 0) + (CXE.Cupon6Quantity * 1.5) + (CXE.Cupon7Quantity * 1.5)) else convert(float,0) end as cupon17Quantity ,case when convert(float, CXE.Cantidad*100) /OXE.Cantidad_Ordenes>40 and ((CXE.Cupon1Quantity * 1.5) + (CXE.Cupon2Quantity * 2) + (CXE.Cupon3Quantity * 1) + (CXE.Cupon4Quantity * 0) + (CXE.Cupon5Quantity * 0) + (CXE.Cupon6Quantity * 1.5) + (CXE.Cupon7Quantity * 1.5))>65 then ((CXE.Cupon1Quantity * 1.5) + (CXE.Cupon2Quantity * 2) + (CXE.Cupon3Quantity * 1) + (CXE.Cupon4Quantity * 0) + (CXE.Cupon5Quantity * 0) + (CXE.Cupon6Quantity * 1.5) + (CXE.Cupon7Quantity * 1.5)) else convert(float,0) end as cupon18Quantity ,round(convert (float, CXE.Cantidad*100) /OXE.Cantidad_Ordenes,2) as porcentaje ,convert(float,(CXE.Cupon1Quantity * 1.5) + (CXE.Cupon2Quantity * 2) + (CXE.Cupon3Quantity * 1) + (CXE.Cupon4Quantity * 0) + (CXE.Cupon5Quantity * 0) + (CXE.Cupon6Quantity * 1.5) + (CXE.Cupon7Quantity * 1.5)) as totalcupones
FROM ##OrdenesXEmpleado AS OXE inner JOIN ##CxEmpleado AS CXE ON CXE.Tienda = OXE.Tienda and CXE.Num_Empleado = OXE.Num_Empleado
ORDER BY OXE.Tienda, CXE.Empleado ASC
DROP TABLE ##OrdenesXEmpleado DROP TABLE ##CxEmpleado

SELECT O.Location_Code AS Tienda, OrdersDump.Added_By as Num_Empleado, E.First_Name+' '+E.Last_Name AS Empleado, SUM(CASE WHEN o.CouponCode in ('2x99','2X99AR','2x99D2','2x99D2') THEN O.OrdCpnQty ELSE 0 END) AS Cupon2x99, SUM(CASE WHEN o.CouponCode in ('FAV199') THEN O.OrdCpnQty ELSE 0 END) AS CuponFavoritas, SUM(CASE WHEN o.CouponCode in ('CHY30','SAR30','ITA30','ORIQ30') THEN O.OrdCpnQty ELSE 0 END) AS CuponFavUpSale, SUM(CASE WHEN o.CouponCode in ('PAQ239','PAQ279') THEN O.OrdCpnQty ELSE 0 END) AS CuponPaquetes, SUM(CASE WHEN o.CouponCode in ('PAQ239') THEN O.OrdCpnQty ELSE 0 END) AS CuponPaquetes1, SUM(CASE WHEN o.CouponCode in ('PAQ279') THEN O.OrdCpnQty ELSE 0 END) AS CuponPaquetes2,
sum(O.OrdCpnQty) as Cantidad INTO ##CxEmpleado FROM OrderCoupons O left join EmployeePOS E on E.location_code=O.location_code inner join OrdersDump on E.Employee_Code=OrdersDump.Added_By and ordersdump.location_code = O.location_code and ordersdump.Order_Number=O.Order_Number LEFT JOIN Tiendas T ON O.Location_Code = T.Number_tienda WHERE (O.Order_Date BETWEEN #DateIni# AND #DateEnd#) AND CouponCode IN ('2x99','2X99AR','2x99D2','2x99D2','FAV199','CHY30','SAR30','ITA30','ORIQ30','PAQ239','PAQ279') AND Order_Status_Code='4' AND OrdersDump.Added_By not in ('1535','1441','2244','7057','6623','5395','9465','6636','4270','8244','1188','9593','2605','8504','0403','7960','9076','1566','3515','8852','5298','9860','6723','3006','0401','1106','2345','7571','3417','6833','3829','4807','7664','9022' ,'0494','0551','0556','0562','0564','0584','0626','0632','0637','0914','3912','4309','4344','4431','5128','5477','6348','6902','7136','8006','8192','8319','8926','9358','9613','0563','2376','2542','2835','3965','4823') AND O.Location_Code IN ('11405','11544','11288','11028','11911','11842','11053','11982','11863','11220','12390','11488','11876','11406','11597','11641','11456','11978','11598','11101','11490','11127','11443','11497','11450','12361','11484','11214','11181')
O.Location_Code = #NumTienda#
T.Ubicacion = #UbicacionTienda#
GROUP BY O.Location_Code, OrdersDump.Added_By, E.First_Name, E.Last_Name
SELECT O.Location_Code AS Tienda, SUM(CASE WHEN o.CouponCode in ('2x99','2X99AR','2x99D2','2x99D2') THEN O.OrdCpnQty ELSE 0 END) AS CUPON1, SUM(CASE WHEN o.CouponCode in ('FAV199') THEN O.OrdCpnQty ELSE 0 END) AS CUPON2, SUM(CASE WHEN o.CouponCode in ('CHY30','SAR30','ITA30','ORIQ30') THEN O.OrdCpnQty ELSE 0 END) AS CUPON3, SUM(CASE WHEN o.CouponCode in ('PAQ239','PAQ279') THEN O.OrdCpnQty ELSE 0 END) AS CUPON4,
sum(O.OrdCpnQty) as Cantidad INTO ##SUCURSAL FROM OrderCoupons O inner join OrdersDump on ordersdump.location_code = O.location_code and ordersdump.Order_Number=O.Order_Number LEFT JOIN Tiendas T ON O.Location_Code = T.Number_tienda WHERE (O.Order_Date BETWEEN #DateIni# AND #DateEnd#) AND CouponCode IN ('2x99','2X99AR','2x99D2','2x99D2','FAV199','CHY30','SAR30','ITA30','ORIQ30','PAQ239','PAQ279')
AND Order_Status_Code='4' AND O.Location_Code IN ('11405','11544','11288','11028','11911','11842','11053','11982','11863','11220','12390','11488','11876','11406','11597','11641','11456','11978','11598','11101','11490','11127','11443','11497','11450','12361','11484','11214','11181')
O.Location_Code = #NumTienda#
T.Ubicacion = #UbicacionTienda#
GROUP BY O.Location_Code
SELECT OrdersDump.Location_Code as Tienda, OrdersDump.Added_By as Num_Empleado, EmployeePOS.First_Name+' '+EmployeePOS.Last_Name as Empleado, COUNT(OrdersDump.Order_Number) as Cantidad_Ordenes INTO ##OrdenesXEmpleado FROM OrdersDump LEFT JOIN EmployeePOS on employeepos.location_code=OrdersDump.location_code and employeepos.Employee_Code=ordersdump.added_by LEFT JOIN Tiendas T ON OrdersDump.Location_Code = T.Number_tienda WHERE (OrdersDump.Order_Date BETWEEN #DateIni# AND #DateEnd#) AND OrdersDump.Order_Status_Code='4' AND OrdersDump.Location_Code IN ('11405','11544','11288','11028','11911','11842','11053','11982','11863','11220','12390','11488','11876','11406','11597','11641','11456','11978','11598','11101','11490','11127','11443','11497','11450','12361','11484','11214','11181')
OrdersDump.Location_Code = #NumTienda#
T.Ubicacion = #UbicacionTienda#
GROUP BY OrdersDump.Location_Code, OrdersDump.Added_By, EmployeePOS.First_Name, EmployeePOS.Last_Name
SELECT OrdersDump.Location_Code as Tienda, COUNT(OrdersDump.Order_Number) as Cantidad_Ordenes INTO ##OrdenesXSucursal FROM OrdersDump LEFT JOIN Tiendas T ON OrdersDump.Location_Code = T.Number_tienda WHERE (OrdersDump.Order_Date BETWEEN #DateIni# AND #DateEnd#) AND OrdersDump.Order_Status_Code='4' AND OrdersDump.Location_Code IN ('11405','11544','11288','11028','11911','11842','11053','11982','11863','11220','12390','11488','11876','11406','11597','11641','11456','11978','11598','11101','11490','11127','11443','11497','11450','12361','11484','11214','11181')
OrdersDump.Location_Code = #NumTienda#
T.Ubicacion = #UbicacionTienda#
GROUP BY OrdersDump.Location_Code
SELECT OrderDetailsExtracts.Store_No AS Tienda, E.First_Name+' '+E.Last_Name AS Empleado, OrderDetailsExtracts.Ord_No as orden, OrdersDump.Added_By as Num_Empleado into ##Adicionales from OrderDetailsExtracts inner join OrderCoupons O on OrderDetailsExtracts.Store_No = o.Location_Code and O.Order_Number = OrderDetailsExtracts.Ord_No left join EmployeePOS E on E.location_code= OrderDetailsExtracts.Store_No inner join OrdersDump on E.Employee_Code=OrdersDump.Added_By and ordersdump.location_code = OrderDetailsExtracts.Store_No and ordersdump.Order_Number=OrderDetailsExtracts.Ord_No LEFT JOIN Tiendas T ON OrderDetailsExtracts.Store_No = T.Number_tienda where Cpn_Cd = ' ' and (Ord_Dt BETWEEN #DateIni# AND #DateEnd#) and Prod_Size_Code not in ('15lts', '16oz','2lts','500ml', '600ml','an600ml') AND O.Location_Code IN ('11405','11544','11288','11028','11911','11842','11053','11982','11863','11220','12390','11488','11876','11406','11597','11641','11456','11978','11598','11101','11490','11127','11443','11497','11450','12361','11484','11214','11181')
OrderDetailsExtracts.Store_No = #NumTienda#
T.Ubicacion = #UbicacionTienda#
GROUP BY OrderDetailsExtracts.Store_No, O.CouponCode,OrdersDump.Added_By, E.First_Name, E.Last_Name, OrderDetailsExtracts.Ord_No, Prod_Size_Code
SELECT round(convert(float, (SUC.CUPON1)*100)/OXS.Cantidad_Ordenes,2) as Porcentaje2a80 ,OXE.Tienda AS Location_Code ,CXE.Num_Empleado ,CXE.Empleado AS NombreEmpleado ,OXE.Cantidad_Ordenes as Cantidad_Ordenes ,convert(float,Cupon2x99) as Cupon1Qn ,CXE.CuponFavoritas as Cupon2Qn ,count(orden) as Adicionales ,CXE.CuponFavUpSale as Cupon3Qn ,CXE.CuponPaquetes Cupon4Qn ,CXE.CuponPaquetes1 Cupon5Qn ,CXE.CuponPaquetes2 Cupon6Qn ,CONVERT(float,((Cupon2x99) * 2)) as Cupon1extra ,convert(float,(CXE.CuponFavoritas * 1)) as Cupon2extra ,convert(float,(CXE.CuponFavUpSale * 1)) as Cupon3extra ,convert(float,((CXE.CuponPaquetes1 * 2.5)+(CXE.CuponPaquetes2 * 3))) as Cupon4extra ,convert(float,((CXE.CuponPaquetes1 * 2.5))) as Cupon5extra ,convert(float,((CXE.CuponPaquetes2 * 3))) as Cupon6extra ,count(orden * 1) as AdicionalesPesos ,round(convert (float, (CXE.Cantidad + count(orden))*100) /OXE.Cantidad_Ordenes,2) as porcentaje ,convert(float,((Cupon2x99) * 2) + (CuponFavoritas * 1) + (CXE.CuponFavUpSale * 1)+ (CXE.CuponPaquetes1 * 2.5)+ (CXE.CuponPaquetes2 * 3)) as totalcupones ,case when convert(float, (CXE.Cantidad + count(orden))*100) /OXE.Cantidad_Ordenes>45 and (((Cupon2x99) * 2) + (CuponFavoritas * 1) + (CXE.CuponFavUpSale * 1) + (CXE.CuponPaquetes1 * 2.5) + (CXE.CuponPaquetes2 * 3))>=100 AND round(convert(float, (SUC.Cupon1)*100)/OXS.Cantidad_Ordenes,2)>16 then (((Cupon2x99) * 2) + (CuponFavoritas * 1) + count(orden * 1) + (CXE.CuponFavUpSale * 1) + (CXE.CuponPaquetes1 * 2.5)+ (CXE.CuponPaquetes2 * 3)) else convert(float,0) end as BANDERAOK
FROM ##OrdenesXEmpleado AS OXE inner JOIN ##CxEmpleado AS CXE ON CXE.Tienda = OXE.Tienda and CXE.Num_Empleado = OXE.Num_Empleado join ##Adicionales as ADS on CXE.Tienda = ADS.Tienda and CXE.Num_Empleado = ADS.Num_Empleado inner join ##OrdenesXSucursal As OXS on oxs.Tienda = CXE.Tienda inner JOIN ##SUCURSAL AS SUC ON SUC.Tienda = ADS.Tienda group by OXE.Tienda , CXE.Num_Empleado, CXE.Empleado, OXE.Cantidad_Ordenes, CXE.Cupon2x99, CXE.CuponFavoritas, CXE.Cantidad , SUC.Cupon1, SUC.Cupon2, OXS.Cantidad_Ordenes, CXE.CuponFavUpSale, CXE.CuponPaquetes,CXE.CuponPaquetes1,CXE.CuponPaquetes2 ORDER BY OXE.Tienda, CXE.Empleado ASC
DROP TABLE ##OrdenesXEmpleado DROP TABLE ##CxEmpleado Drop TABLE ##Adicionales Drop TABLE ##SUCURSAL Drop table ##OrdenesXSucursal
